titleStmt.title: Observations upon the statute of 22 Car. II. cap. I. entituled, An act to prevent and suppress seditious conventicles by Sir Edmund Saunders, Kt. ...
titleStmt.author: Saunders, Edmund, Sir, d. 1683.

notesStmt.note: "The Lord Saunders ... did write this explanation ... so far as page 79 ... for the residue, as it had not the same authour, so neither doth it expect the same authority, it being added as an essay to supply what was left undone"--To the reader.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
